tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE team_budget_allocations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    expense_name TEXT,
    expense_amount DECIMAL,
    revenue_source TEXT,
    revenue_amount DECIMAL,
    financial_projection TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Expenses (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    allocation_id INT,
    expense_date DATE,
    expense_description TEXT,
    expense_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialProjections (
    projection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    projection_date DATE,
    projected_revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
    projected_expenses DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Expenses (
    expense_id INT,
    team_id INT,
    expense_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL,
    expense_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE RevenueSources (
    source_id INT,
    revenue_source VARCHAR(50),
    team_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    revenue_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialProjections (
    projection_id INT,
    team_id INT,
    projection_type VARCHAR(50),
    projected_amount DECIMAL,
    projection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Teams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_lead VARCHAR(50),
    budget_allocated DECIMAL,
    revenue_generated DECIMAL
);
